item.title: sqlite_lite
item.description:
Recreating the base functionality of SQLite in Rust.

WIP: https://github.com/Kyu/sqlite-lite

item.title: QueuePreview
item.description:
Developed an app that helped over 1.5k students prioritize and keep track of companies present at the 49th NSBE convention, resulting in increased student engagement and efficient company interaction.

This was a project built out of a direct need of mine, and was a fun and passionate learning experience. Seeing how it helped fellow students in the same situation that I was in was incredibly satisfying.

I’m also proud of the quick timeline I put it together in, I learned ReactNative, FastAPI, and a lot about UI/UX in about 3 weeks, and still marketed it enough in about a week and a half to gather ~1.5k users across mobile and web.

item.title: TabulatedChests
item.description: Adds a chest with multiple tabs

item.title: Colaria
item.description:
Designed a cross platform, universal app to allow a user to control their computer using their mobile device.

Implemented a custom protocol to allow touchpad input or gyroscope data to be sent over LAN, allowing the PC cursor location to be updated in real time.

A WIP still, work is still being done to enhance the project and make it useful for a wide variety of users, from user interview feedback.
